messages.welcomeTemplate:
Thank you for reaching out to SPEED Bath Tech!

We've received your message and truly appreciate your interest. Our team is reviewing your inquiry, and a senior representative will get in touch with you shortly.

With over 25 years of experience in premium bath fittings, we're here to deliver quality and service you can trust.

If your request is urgent, feel free to call us at +91-9205162284.

Thank you once again for connecting with us!

â€” Team SPEED Bath Tech
